text: Good Morning, Magpie is an album by the band Murder By Death. It was released on April 6, 2010. It is their second release through Vagrant Records. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== * Adam Turla – lead vocals, guitars, keyboards * Sarah Balliet – cello * Dagan Thogerson – drums, percussion * Matt Armstrong – bass ==References== Category:2010 albums Category:Murder by Death (band) albums Category:Vagrant Records albums
title: Good Morning, Magpie
